short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: TickleTab implements GTD-like Ticklers for tabs.
short.de: TickleTab erweitert Chrome um eine Wiedervorlage für Tabs.
short.fr: TickleTab implémente les Ticklers à la façon de GTD pour onglets.
short.pl: TickleTab przystosowuje GTD-podobne Ticklers dla wszystkich kart.
short.ru: TickleTab позволяет отложить ссылку на определенный день.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TickleTab implements the Tickler idea of David Allen's GTD. It saves all the tabs you don't need right now and presents them again at the specified date.

Plans for future versions:
  - Interface tweaks
  - Options
  - Beginners' Guide
  - Adding more languages

Version History:
  0.2:
     - Added labels for dates
  0.3: 
     - Added language support (English, German, Chinese)
     - Automatic shortening of long titles
     - Increased performance
     0.3.1:
          - Tooltip translation
     0.3.2:
          - Added Russian
     0.3.3:
          - Bugfix
  0.4: 
     - Implemented undo for label/tickler deletions
  0.5
     - Save all open tabs
     - Bugfix: Open all tabs not working properly
     0.5.1:
          - Added French, Polish
     0.5.2
          - Updated manifest version

We'd appreciate your feeback.
